name: Gun Done: WHO IS AWESOME
description:
Gun Done: Who is Awesome - a Duel Arcade game in the Push-A-Couple-Of-Buttons-To-Win genre, in which you enter the face-to-face battle with your Fate in the shoes of the daredevil named Donegun.

The Story
Go on a journey with Donegun along the almost non-fictional Wild West through all the trials of Fate, and recover everything that life has taken from you.

Duels
A variety of battle modes, among which:
- Common "Draw your gun at noon and shoot."
- Uncommon "Take your weapon from the scarecrow first".
- Epic "Run, tough guys don’t look back at the explosion."
- Legendary "Do not let the Indian tomahawk reach your body."
And other realistic and not very realistic situations in dueling!

Bounty hunting
A special higher difficulty mode for the shooters who have a gun to the knee. Try to defeat your opponents!

Game for two
When AI-opponents seem too simple to you, and you want something more difficult - draw the attention of your friend or foe with "1-on-1" mode.

Are you ready to show them Who is Awesome?
